title: Unshackle
description: Unshackle is an AI-driven ally built by underdogs, for underdogs to reclaim their power from abuse. By analyzing hidden patterns of abuse and aggregating incident data, it predicts escalating risks, giving survivors the insights they need to stay one step ahead. With real-time metrics and detailed reports, Unshackle arms users with the tools to protect their autonomy, rewrite their story, and shape a future on their own terms.
